document.full_text: the n.b.a. postponed the deadline for the owners of the sacramento kings to apply for a move to anaheim with sacramento mayor kevin johnson making a pitch to leave the team where it is.
document.title: kings relocation bid gets extension
lines_and_colors: the n.b.a. postponed the deadline for the owners of the sacramento kings to apply for a move to anaheim with sacramento mayor kevin johnson making a pitch to leave the team where it is.
